Headline: Delays Affecting Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: Bue Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving O'Hare and Forest Park. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
BLue Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving O'Hare and Forest Park. Expect longer-than-usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
